name: fpa-lpa-dashboard
description: Real-time FPA/LPA performance dashboard for Distribution Center 6084. Track associate metrics, building goals, and area-specific performance with dynamic filtering and detailed analytics.
author: Walmart DC 6084
features: Dynamic filtering by area, shift, and role
Score cards by area and shift
